ygData.subject: Re: Plane of Hate and bard armor Question
ygData.msgSnippet: CastersRealm had this to say: PLANE ITEM UPDATE From what I have seen in game today it would appear that certain classes equipment are specific to a particular
ygData.messageBody:
CastersRealm had this to say:

PLANE ITEM UPDATE
From what I have seen in game today it would appear that certain classes
equipment are specific to a particular plane.

Magician Items spawn on Male Revenant's in Hate.
Enchanter Items spawn on Female Revenant's in Hate.
Wizard Items spawn on Frightfinger's in Fear.
Necromancer Items spawn on Boogeymen in Fear.
Off topic a little, but it also appears that Monk, Paladin, Shadowknight and
Ranger armour is all in Fear. Whilst Shaman, Bard, Rogue, Warrior and Cleric
armour is in Hate.


----- Original Message -----

> From: "M Sanford (Maev)" <pr0teus@...>
>
> Which mob drops the bard armor? I heard tell that bard armor has been
> moved from PoF (boogeymen) to PoH.
> Mummy monks - warrior armor, clerics of innorukk - cleric armor, male
> revenants - mage armor, female revenants - enchanter armor, gargoyles -
> rogue armor, spite golems - shaman armor.
> Now this leaves a few mobs.. the ire (somethings or other. they look
> like ghouls), the ashenbone drakes (mini dracoliches), the scorn
> banshees, the liches (mini spectres), and possibly some other mobs left
> that i didnt see.
>
> If anyone knows, please do tell.
>
> Maev Lorekeeper
> Tarew Marr
>
